name: Visual F# Script File
summary: Learn about .FSX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Unlike F# source code files (.FS extension), FSX files are not compiled into .DLL or .EXE files and then and run. Instead, they are executed as a script by F# Interactive.
NOTE: F# Interactive mode can be started in Visual Studio by selecting a segment of F# code and pressing Alt-Enter. F# scripts also use the .FSSCRIPT extension.

description: Script written in F# (pronounced "F Sharp"), a functional programming language formally introduced by Microsoft with Visual Studio 2010; can be run with the "F# Interactive" component of Visual Studio; used for scripting F# code instead of compiling it.
